abilities.name: Alchemist
abilities.description: When you invent or craft a creation with alchemical features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special formula already known.

abilities.name: Analyst
abilities.description: During downtime, you get two ticks to distribute among any long term project clocks that involve investigation or learning a new formula or design plan.

abilities.name: Artificer
abilities.description: When you invent or craft a creation with spark-craft features, take +1 result level to your roll. You begin with one special design already known.

abilities.name: Fortitude
abilities.description: You may expend your special armor to resist a consequence of fatigue, weakness, or chemical effects, or to push yourself when working with technical skill or handling alchemicals.

abilities.name: Ghost Ward
abilities.description: You know how to Wreck an area with arcane substances and methods so it is either anathema or enticing to spirits (your choice).

abilities.name: Physicker
abilities.description: You can Tinker with bones, blood, and bodily humours to treat wounds or stabilize the dying. You may study a malady or corpse. Everyone in your crew gets +1d to their healing treatment rolls

abilities.name: Saboteur
abilities.description: When you Wreck, the work is much quieter than it should be and the damage is hidden from casual inspection.

abilities.name: Venomous
abilities.description: Choose a drug or poison (from your bandolier stock) to which you have become immune. You can push yourself to secrete it through your skin or saliva or exhale it as a vapor.

abilities.name: Veteran
abilities.description: Choose a special ability from another source.
